attributes.action: Place a reasonable limit on the amount of time asylum seekers should be tagged.  It restricts their social, emotional and physical lives.  3 months max please! Then sign on.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Asylum seekers should not feel like common criminals lugging around tags on ankles.  It is very unjust especially for those who handed themselves over.  It feels like a punishment for trying to sort your legal status out.  No wonder people just sit back and work illegally.  Who wants to be punished for doing right?
